title: Pasta Fruit Salad
ingredients: ['200g acini di pepe pasta', '1 1/3 (432g) tins crushed pineapple, drained with juice reserved', '1 1/2 (295g) tins mandarin segments, drained with liquid reserved', '225ml whipped cream', '200g mini marshmallows', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs, beaten', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '1 1/4 (225g) jars cocktail cherries, drained (optional)']
